name: NeonatalHerpesTestsForHerpesSimplexVirusNucleicAcidInCSF
title: Neonatal herpes (Tests for Herpes simplex virus Nucleic Acid in CSF)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with tests for Herpes simplex virus Nucleic Acid in CSF),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Herpes simplex virus Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
